Package it.polimi.ingsw.playerBoard.resourceLocations

Class Depot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.playerBoard.resourceLocations.Depot
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConcreteResourceLocation, ResourceLocation
Direct Known Subclasses:
LeaderCardDepot
public class Depot
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConcreteResourceLocation
Depot is the class for warehouse depots

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Depot​(int slots)
    The constructor creates a new Depot with an empty ConcreteResourceSet and the capacity received as parameter

    void addResources​(ConcreteResourceSet concreteResourceSet)
    addResources adds a given ConcreteResourceSet to this Depot

    containsResources checks whether a given ConcreteResourceSet is contained in this depot

    getResources returns a copy of the resources contained in this Depot

    getResourceType returns the type of resource contained in this Depot

    • Depot

      public Depot​(int slots) throws InvalidDepotSizeException
      The constructor creates a new Depot with an empty ConcreteResourceSet and the capacity received as parameter
      Parameters:
      slots - The required capacity
      Throws:
      InvalidDepotSizeException - slots is not strictly positive

  • Method Details

    • getResourceType

      public ConcreteResource getResourceType()
      getResourceType returns the type of resource contained in this Depot
      Returns:
      The type of ConcreteResource contained in this Depot or null if no resources are present

      public void addResources​(ConcreteResourceSet concreteResourceSet) throws InvalidResourceSetException, InvalidResourceLocationOperationException
      addResources adds a given ConcreteResourceSet to this Depot
      Specified by:
      addResources in interface ConcreteResourceLocation
      Parameters:
      concreteResourceSet - The ConcreteResourceSet to add
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceSetException - concreteResourceSet is null
      InvalidResourceLocationOperationException - concreteResourcesSet cannot be added to this Depot

    • removeResources

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      concreteResourceSet - The ConcreteResourceSet to remove
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceSetException - concreteResourceSet is null
      InvalidResourceLocationOperationException - concreteResourceSet cannot be removed from this Depot

    • canAdd

      public boolean canAdd​(ConcreteResourceSet concreteResourceSet) throws InvalidResourceSetException
      canAdd checks whether a given ConcreteResourceSet can be added to this Depot
      Specified by:
      canAdd in interface ConcreteResourceLocation
      Parameters:
      concreteResourceSet - The ConcreteResourceSet to check
      Returns:
      True iff concreteResourceSet can be added to this Depot
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceSetException - concreteResourceSet is null

    • containsResources

      public boolean containsResources​(ConcreteResourceSet concreteResourceSet) throws InvalidResourceSetException
      containsResources checks whether a given ConcreteResourceSet is contained in this depot
      Specified by:
      containsResources in interface ResourceLocation
      Parameters:
      concreteResourceSet - The ConcreteResourceSet to check
      Returns:
      True iff this Depot contains concreteResourceSet
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceSetException - concreteResourceSet is null

    • getResources

      getResources returns a copy of the resources contained in this Depot
      Specified by:

      Returns:
